entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. POP 40%

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog dissipating after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
